page.title: 16CLUBS IN HENFIELD.
page.content: There are many Clubs, Associations and Societies meeting in the Village for both young and old. There is no need to be bored! The W. I. by Christine. W. I. stands for the Women's Institute. It is where all the ladies meet up. They meet on Tuesday either in the Village Hall or at people's homes. In the Summer they hold the Summer Show. In 1985 it was the 50th anniversary. The Summer Show is where all the villagers join in competitions and there is a prize cup in every section. Outside there are stalls. Ballet Lessons by Nicole. I have been going to ballet since I was 2. I enjoy it. My teacher takes 2 to 14 year olds. I am in the last class but I am only nine. There is only one person on their points. I go to lessons on Saturdays.
